subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=57|rad=弓|as=05|sn=8|four=|canj=NSS|ids=⿰弓巨}}

# [[indomitable]] [[courage]]
# (same as [[張]] [[张]]) [[stretch]], [[extend]], [[expand]]
# [[sheet]]
# ''A [[surname]]'', listed #24 of the ''[[:w:Baijiaxing|Baijiaxing]]''
# [[:w:Measure word|Measure word]] for flat things such as pictures and pieces of paper

subSections.title: References
subSections.text: * [http://www.iso10646hk.net/jp/document/download.jsp Jyutping Database (iso10646hk.net) - Cantonese Pronunciation List (Part 2), p. 104]

subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text: * {{ja-readings|on=[[くつ]] (kutsu), [[ぐち]] (guchi), [[ちょう]] (chō)|kun=[[つよくいさましい]] (tsuyokuisamashii)}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The [[jué]] reading is only used with the "indomitable courage" definition. The [[zhāng]] reading is only used with the "stretch, extend, expand", "sheet", "surname" and "measure word" definitions.
